title: Don't know if it's a coincidence, but I'm only having sudden disconnect issues during ARAM.
body: As the title says. Every time I play ARAM, my game would disconnect for a few seconds and then reconnect throughout the whole game. I'm fine during normals and ranked. I haven't had a problem once, but every time I play ARAM, the issue comes back. Is it just a coincidence, or do other people share the same problem? This has been going on for a week.

replies.body: You could be having an unstable connection, so it's a bit erratic as well as a coincidence.  It's all routing to the same location so game mode should impact this.  I suggest running through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help with troubleshooting.  Test it out in a custom just to be sure.  Let me know if you have any questions!
